name: Itsuka Kotori | Date a Live
description:
Huggingface: https://huggingface.co/Maisman/Date-a-live

Itsuka Kotori from Date a Live

This has to be improved but I think its okey for now.
Some images include: https://civitai.com/models/5891/crazy-expressions

How to use:

Recommended weight: 0.3 - 0.7

(black background, white background)

in negative. Default images will mostly have black or white background.

Sad part: Generating images with lollipops is hard. All my results were not good enaugh. I will try to improve it someday.

This lora is very flexible with her outfit. You have to describe her complete outfit to match her anime style. See example images and prompts.

Trigger words:

Normal:

itsuka kotori, date a live, school uniform, miniskirt, black ribbon, long hair, red hair, twintails, boots, red eyes, looking at viewer, standing, red jacket, white shirt

Kotori with lollipop:

lollipop, holding lollipop, candy,

Spirit form:

astral dress, spirit form, spirit, fire, axe, horns,

I got better results with her normal outfit/school uniform. Her spirit form has mostly a deformed weapon but the images are still not that bad.
